thread.title: Wall Street opens higher as financial, energy stocks gain

title: Wall Street opens higher as financial, energy stocks gain
text: March 15, 2018 / 1:40 PM / Updated 26 minutes ago Wall Street opens higher as financial, energy stocks gain   (Reuters) - Wall Streetâ€™s main indexes opened higher on Thursday, led by gains in financial and energy stocks and support from strong economic data. Traders work on the trading floor at the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) in Manhattan, New York City, U.S., March 14, 2018. REUTERS/Andrew Kelly The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 103.8 points, or 0.42 percent, to 24,861.92. The S&P 500 gained 6.2 points, or 0.225497 percent, to 2,755.68.The Nasdaq Composite added 8.11 points, or 0.11 percent, to 7,504.92. Reporting by Sruthi Shankar in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur
